data.eml:eml: Alona kotovi sp. nov., a new species of Aloninae (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Chydoridae) from South Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sinev, Artem Y. (2012): Alona kotovi sp. nov., a new species of Aloninae (Cladocera: Anomopoda: Chydoridae) from South Vietnam. Zootaxa 3475: 45-54, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209547
